submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        d = defaultdict(list)
        ar = []
        for i in range(len(nums)//2):
            a, b = nums[i], nums[-i-1]
            if a > b:
                a, b = b, a
            maxd = max(b, k - a)
            d[b-a].append(maxd)
            ar.append(maxd)
        for v in d.values():
            v.sort()
        ar.sort()
        ans = 1e9
        #print(ar)
        for dif, v in d.items():
            t0 = len(v)
            t2 = bisect_left(ar, dif) - bisect_left(v, dif)
            t1 = len(nums)//2 - t0 - t2
            t = t1 + 2*t2
            #print(dif, t0, t1, t2, v, t)
            ans = min(ans, t)
        return ans
